name: Fling to the Finish Pre-Alpha Demo
name_original: Fling to the Finish Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
Fling to the Finish Pre-Alpha Demo

Fling to the Finish is a cooperative platformer where you’re tethered to your best friend, or worst enemy. Get up close and personal with your partner as you share a controller operating two halves of a duo of creatures connected by an elastic band. Teams will have to stay in constant communication to stand a chance of getting through crazy, unpredictable obstacle courses to make their way to the finish line! 

Each team uses one controller to play. Player one controls the left character with the left side of the controller, and player two controls the right character with the right side of the controller. If a player doesn't have a teammate, they can control both characters with one controller. 

SplitSide Website,  Twitter,  Facebook,  Youtube
